eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class Selector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Selector

  • public class Selector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Selector provides methods for the implementation of the Selector Tool including selection of the entire canvas, modifying height and width of the selection, modifying location of the selection, and deselection.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static int CANVASHEIGHT 
      (package private) static int CANVASWIDTH 
      private int setHeight
      Set height for the selection area.
      private int setWidth
      Set width for the selection area.
      private int x_pos
      The X position for the upper left hand corner of the selection area.
      private int y_pos
      The Y position for the upper left hand corner of the selection area.
